file.content:
{
  "name": "kirk-estate-planning",
  "private": true,
  "version": "0.0.0",
  "type": "module",
  "scripts": {
    "dev": "vite",
    "build": "vite build",
    "lint": "eslint .",
    "preview": "vite preview",
    "build:static": "vite build && cp dist/index.html dist/404.html"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "react": "^19.1.1",
    "react-daisyui": "^5.0.5",
    "react-dom": "^19.1.1",
    "react-router-dom": "^7.9.5"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@eslint/js": "^9.36.0",
    "@types/node": "^24.6.0",
    "@types/react": "^19.1.16",
    "@types/react-dom": "^19.1.9",
    "@vitejs/plugin-react": "^5.0.4",
    "autoprefixer": "^10.4.21",
    "daisyui": "^4.12.24",
    "eslint": "^9.36.0",
    "eslint-plugin-react-hooks": "^5.2.0",
    "eslint-plugin-react-refresh": "^0.4.22",
    "globals": "^16.4.0",
    "postcss": "^8.5.6",
    "tailwindcss": "^3.4.18",
    "terser": "^5.44.1",
    "typescript": "~5.9.3",
    "typescript-eslint": "^8.45.0",
    "vite": "^7.1.7"
  },
  "description": "Modernized version of https://kirkestateplanning.com/"
}

import { StrictMode } from 'react'
import { createRoot } from 'react-dom/client'
import './index.css'
import App from './App.tsx'

createRoot(document.getElementById('root')!).render(
  <StrictMode>
    <App />
  </StrictMode>,
)

tool_input.plan:
## Fix Site Runtime Issues

**Type and Data Structure Fixes:**
1. Fix Hero component data structure mismatch - update Hero component to handle `cta` array properly
2. Add null safety checks to Header component for navigation array access
3. Update component interfaces to match actual data structure in props.ts

**Router Setup:**
4. Wrap App component with React Router's BrowserRouter to enable routing functionality
5. Convert external links to proper routing or external link handling

**Styling Fixes:**
6. Define missing CSS custom properties for brand colors (brand-1, brand-5, brand-6) in index.css
7. Add fallback styles or replace with standard Tailwind/DaisyUI classes

**Asset Management:**
8. Replace placeholder image URLs with proper static assets or remove references
9. Add missing favicon and og-image files to public directory

**Testing:**
10. Run development server and verify all components render without errors
11. Test navigation functionality and responsive design

tool_response.plan:
## Fix Site Runtime Issues

**Type and Data Structure Fixes:**
1. Fix Hero component data structure mismatch - update Hero component to handle `cta` array properly
2. Add null safety checks to Header component for navigation array access
3. Update component interfaces to match actual data structure in props.ts

**Router Setup:**
4. Wrap App component with React Router's BrowserRouter to enable routing functionality
5. Convert external links to proper routing or external link handling

**Styling Fixes:**
6. Define missing CSS custom properties for brand colors (brand-1, brand-5, brand-6) in index.css
7. Add fallback styles or replace with standard Tailwind/DaisyUI classes

**Asset Management:**
8. Replace placeholder image URLs with proper static assets or remove references
9. Add missing favicon and og-image files to public directory

**Testing:**
10. Run development server and verify all components render without errors
11. Test navigation functionality and responsive design

# Website Crawl Data

**Original URL:** https://kirkestateplanning.com/
**Crawled on:** 2025-11-06T06:02:15.612Z

## Site Metadata

**Title:** Kirk Estate Planning - Estate Planning, Wills Trusts
**Description:** Wills, trusts, and estates made easy.  Emily Kirk, attorney at law. Services in Missouri and Illinois. Free consultation. Fixed pricing.

## Main Page Content

[(314) 266-2649](tel:3142662649)
[](https://kirkestateplanning.com/#)

[![Kirk Estate Planning](https://img1.wsimg.com/isteam/ip/2af68cd7-c864-437a-9148-1fae4248531f/E%20Kirk%20Logo%20Text.jpg/:/rs=h:101,cg:true,m/qt=q:95)](https://kirkestateplanning.com/ "Kirk Estate Planning")
# Wills and trusts made easy.
Wills and trusts made easy.Wills and trusts made easy.
![](https://img1.wsimg.com/isteam/ip/2af68cd7-c864-437a-9148-1fae4248531f/Family%20inside%202.jpg/:/cr=t:0%25,l:0%25,w:100%25,h:100%25/rs=h:500,cg:true)
**Estate planning with expertise, care, and a personal connection.**
##  Services In Missouri and illinois
* * *
#### Initial Consultation
#### Initial Consultation
![Image is of an elderly woman in consultation](https://img1.wsimg.com/isteam/stock/4089/:/cr=t:12.53%25,l:0%25,w:100%25,h:74.93%25/rs=w:388,h:194,cg:true)
Start planning your estate with a free initial consultation with Emily. You don't need to prepare or bring anything. We'll have a conversation to discuss your needs, answer questions, and help you establish your estate planning goals.
  

We offer remote and in-person consultations.
  

_**Free of Charge**_
[Find out more](https://kirkestateplanning.com/consultation)
#### Will Package
#### Initial Consultation
![image is of an African American family including a wife, husband and two children - a girl and a boy](https://img1.wsimg.com/isteam/stock/10969/:/cr=t:5.36%25,l:0%25,w:100%25,h:89.29%25/rs=w:388,h:194,cg:true)
A Last Will & Testament provides instructions to the probate court indicating your exact wishes about who will care for your children, who is in charge of implementing your wishes (your executor) and how your assets will be distributed. Your will and all other documents filed with the probate court will be public record. 
[View Pricing & Documents](https://kirkestateplanning.com/wills)
#### Trust Package
#### Trust Package
![](https://img1.wsimg.com/isteam/ip/2af68cd7-c864-437a-9148-1fae4248531f/b909a9fe-e535-4b1b-85ba-5b1f6c6dce30.jpg/:/rs=w:388,h:194,cg:true,m/cr=w:388,h:194)
A Revocable Trust accomplishes everything that a will does, but with the significant advantage of avoiding the probate process. “Revocable” means that you retain control over your finances, possessions, and wishes. At any time during your life, you can change or even revoke your Revocable Trust. 
[View Pricing & Documents](https://kirkestateplanning.com/trusts)
##  Emily Kirk
* * *
#### Background and Qualifications
I grew up in central Illinois and have lived in St. Louis since the early 1990s. I graduated from the Washington University School of Law in St. Louis and practice law in Missouri and Illinois. I practiced business litigation for several years and also spent a decade working in higher education. My husband and I enjoy participating in local trivia nights and spending time with our two children.
#### Estate Planning
I was trained in estate planning by a prestigious, nationally-recognized law firm and found that it was an area of practice that I loved. I have helped hundreds of clients with their wills, trusts, and estate planning needs.
#### Focus
I enjoy working with estate planning clients because of the positive outcomes and the peace of mind that clients experience when it's all done. It is the most rewarding work of my career. That's why it's all I do.
##  Social
* * *
[](https://www.facebook.com/161073911339056)[](https://www.linkedin.com/in/emily-kirk-0064516a)
##  Reviews from Clients
* * *
![](https://kirkestateplanning.com/)
_Emily Kirk did a wonderful job of explaining everything to us. She wanted some questions answered prior to our signing, and she took the time to give me a call to discuss. We were especially grateful for the Saturday appointment, especially with my husband and me working day/evening hours. My husband and I are very pleased with her and the firm. Will definitely contact again if we have a need._
**Ted and Linda**
Florissant, MO
  

_Emily was able to meld our vision and complex situation into a comprehensive, simple to understand estate plan. She was a pleasure to work with as we worked through several issues. Lastly, she has her own family and understands the importance of a family protecting their estate. I highly recommend Emily._
**Konrad and Darla**
O'Fallon, IL
_We had several adjustments to my trust. Emily was very careful and she did a great job explaining the details. I feel confident that the final document is precisely what I need to protect my heirs._
**Robert M.**
Kirkwood, MO
_We had been putting off getting our wills in order for more than 10 years. Always seemed such a daunting task to find a qualified and affordable lawyer to do this. Emily Kirk was our attorney and she did a great job of answering our questions. We had one face-to-face meeting, she drafted our documents that we reviewed electronically, then we met again for final review and signing. Simple, easy and frankly very affordable. My wife and I are very pleased to know that we have checked this important item off our to do list. Thanks Emily!_
**Kerry K.**
St. Louis, MO
_Emily Kirk did a tremendous job, she explained everything in detail and in such a manner it could be understood. She was professional but at the same time made Kelly and I feel at ease. Overall a great experience._
**Kelly and Donald**
Belleville, IL
  

_Emily did a great job leading us through the process._
**Barbara and Dave**
St. Louis, MO
  

_I was very pleased with the competency and professionalism of Emily Kirk._
**Susan**
St. Louis, MO

Initial Consultation

Start planning your estate with a free initial consultation with Emily

Free of Charge

What to Expect

You don't need to prepare or bring anything. We'll have a conversation to discuss your needs, answer questions, and help you establish your estate planning goals.

We offer remote and in-person consultations to accommodate your schedule and preferences.

No preparation required
Remote and in-person options
Free of charge

Schedule Your Free Consultation

Contact Emily Directly

Call or text to schedule your consultation

(314) 266-2649

Office Information

168 N Meramec Ave Suite 150
Clayton, MO 63105

Hours: 9:00 AM – 6:00 PM
Flexible scheduling available

Ready to Get Started?

After your consultation, Emily will recommend the best estate planning solution for your needs.

Learn About Wills Learn About Trusts

tool_input.content:
import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Header from '../components/Header'; import Footer from '../components/Footer'; import SEOHead from '../components/SEOHead'; import { headerProps, footerProps } from '../data/props'; const Wills: React.FC = () => { return (

Will Package

Comprehensive estate planning with a Last Will & Testament

What Is a Last Will & Testament?

A Last Will & Testament provides instructions to the probate court indicating your exact wishes about:

Who will care for your children
Who is in charge of implementing your wishes (your executor)
How your assets will be distributed
Your will and all other documents filed with the probate court will be public record.

Will Package Includes

Last Will & Testament

Complete will document with your specific instructions

Guardian Designation

Legal designation for child guardianship

Executor Authorization

Powers and responsibilities for your executor

Asset Distribution

Detailed instructions for asset allocation

Legal Compliance

Missouri and Illinois state law compliance

Professional Guidance

Expert advice throughout the process

Consider a Trust Package

While a will is essential, a trust package offers additional benefits including avoiding probate, maintaining privacy, and potentially reducing costs for your beneficiaries.

Compare with Trust Package

Ready to Start Your Will?

Begin with a free consultation to discuss your specific needs and goals.

Schedule Free Consultation Call (314) 266-2649
); }; export default Wills;

A Last Will & Testament provides instructions to the probate court indicating your exact wishes about:

Who will care for your children

Your will and all other documents filed with the probate court will be public record.

tool_input.content:
import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Header from '../components/Header'; import Footer from '../components/Footer'; import SEOHead from '../components/SEOHead'; import { headerProps, footerProps } from '../data/props'; const Trusts: React.FC = () => { return (

Trust Package

Advanced estate planning with a Revocable Trust

What Is a Revocable Trust?

A Revocable Trust accomplishes everything that a will does, but with the significant advantage of avoiding the probate process.

"Revocable" means that you retain control over your finances, possessions, and wishes. At any time during your life, you can change or even revoke your Revocable Trust.

Trust Advantages

  • Avoids probate court process
  • Maintains privacy (not public record)
  • Faster distribution to beneficiaries
  • Reduces court costs and fees
  • You retain full control during lifetime
  • Can be modified or revoked anytime

Trust vs. Will

Privacy

Trust remains private, while will becomes public record

Speed

Trust avoids lengthy probate process

Costs

Trust eliminates probate court fees and delays

Control

Both allow you to maintain control during your lifetime

Trust Package Includes

Revocable Trust Document

Comprehensive trust agreement tailored to your needs

Pour-Over Will

Backup will to handle any assets not in the trust

Financial Power of Attorney

Designate someone to handle financial matters if needed

Healthcare Directives

Medical decision-making authority and end-of-life wishes

Funding Guidance

Instructions for transferring assets into the trust

Ongoing Support

Guidance for trust administration and modifications

Is a Trust Right for You?

Schedule a free consultation to discuss whether a trust or will package best meets your estate planning goals.

Schedule Free Consultation Call (314) 266-2649

Compare with Will Package

); }; export default Trusts;

Meet Emily Kirk

Estate Planning Attorney • Missouri & Illinois

Background and Qualifications

I grew up in central Illinois and have lived in St. Louis since the early 1990s. I graduated from the Washington University School of Law in St. Louis and practice law in Missouri and Illinois.

I practiced business litigation for several years and also spent a decade working in higher education. My husband and I enjoy participating in local trivia nights and spending time with our two children.

Quick Facts

Education: Washington University School of Law

Experience: Hundreds of estate planning clients
Background: Business litigation and higher education

Hundreds of satisfied clients

My Focus & Passion

I enjoy working with estate planning clients because of the positive outcomes and the peace of mind that clients experience when it's all done. It is the most rewarding work of my career.

import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Header from '../components/Header'; import Footer from '../components/Footer'; import SEOHead from '../components/SEOHead'; import { headerProps, footerProps } from '../data/props'; const Values: React.FC = () => { return (

Our Values

Estate planning with expertise, care, and a personal connection

Why Choose Kirk Estate Planning?

At Kirk Estate Planning, we believe that effective estate planning goes beyond just legal documents. It's about understanding your family, your goals, and your concerns to create a plan that truly protects what matters most to you.

Emily Kirk brings not only legal expertise but also a genuine commitment to helping families achieve peace of mind through thoughtful, comprehensive estate planning.

Expertise

Trained by prestigious law firms with experience helping hundreds of clients

Care

Thoughtful attention to every detail of your estate planning needs

Personal Connection

Understanding your family's unique circumstances and goals

Peace of Mind

Ensuring your family is protected and your wishes are honored

What Sets Us Apart

Dedicated Focus

Estate planning is the most rewarding work of Emily's career. That's why it's all she does - providing focused expertise and attention to each client.

Family Understanding

Emily has her own family and understands the importance of protecting your estate for the people you care about most.

No Pressure Approach

We believe in education and guidance, not high-pressure sales. You'll never feel rushed into decisions about your family's future.

Proven Results

Hundreds of satisfied clients across Missouri and Illinois have experienced the peace of mind that comes from proper estate planning.

Our Promise to You

"I enjoy working with estate planning clients because of the positive outcomes and the peace of mind that clients experience when it's all done. It is the most rewarding work of my career."

- Emily Kirk

Experience Our Values Firsthand

Start with a free consultation and discover how our approach can bring peace of mind to your family.

Schedule Free Consultation Call (314) 266-2649

Learn more:

About Emily Client Reviews Will Package Trust Package
); }; export default Values;

I feel confident that the final document is precisely what I need to protect my heirs.", author: "Robert M.", location: "Kirkwood, MO" }, { text: "We had been putting off getting our wills in order for more than 10 years. Always seemed such a daunting task to find a qualified and affordable lawyer to do this. Emily Kirk was our attorney and she did a great job of answering our questions. We had one face-to-face meeting, she drafted our documents that we reviewed electronically, then we met again for final review and signing. Simple, easy and frankly very affordable. My wife and I are very pleased to know that we have checked this important item off our to do list. Thanks Emily!", author: "Kerry K.", location: "St. Louis, MO" }, { text: "Emily Kirk did a tremendous job, she explained everything in detail and in such a manner it could be understood. She was professional but at the same time made Kelly and I feel at ease. Overall a great experience.", author: "Kelly and Donald", location: "Belleville, IL" }, { text: "Emily did a great job leading us through the process.", author: "Barbara and Dave", location: "St. Louis, MO" }, { text: "I was very pleased with the competency and professionalism of Emily Kirk.", author: "Susan", location: "St. Louis, MO" } ]; return (

Client Reviews

Hear from families across Missouri and Illinois who have experienced peace of mind through professional estate planning

{[1, 2, 3, 4, 5].map((star) => ( ))}
Hundreds of satisfied clients
{reviews.map((review, index) => (
{[1, 2, 3, 4, 5].map((star) => ( ))}

"{review.text}"

{review.author}

{review.location}

))}

Professional Excellence

Clients consistently praise Emily's competency, professionalism, and thorough explanations

Flexible Scheduling

Weekend and evening appointments available to accommodate busy schedules

Personal Approach

Emily takes time to understand each family's unique situation and makes clients feel at ease

Common Themes in Client Feedback

  • Clear explanations and patient guidance
  • Professional yet personal approach
  • Accommodating and flexible scheduling
  • Streamlined, efficient process
  • Affordable and transparent pricing
  • Understanding of family dynamics
  • Attention to detail and accuracy
  • Peace of mind and confidence

Join Our Satisfied Clients

Experience the same professional, caring service that has earned these glowing reviews.

Schedule Free Consultation Call (314) 266-2649

Learn more about our services:

Will Package Trust Package About Emily Our Values
); }; export default Reviews;

import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Header from '../components/Header'; import Footer from '../components/Footer'; import SEOHead from '../components/SEOHead'; import { headerProps, footerProps } from '../data/props'; const Blog: React.FC = () => { const blogPosts = [ { title: "5 Essential Estate Planning Documents Everyone Needs", excerpt: "Learn about the core documents that form the foundation of any comprehensive estate plan, from wills to powers of attorney.", date: "March 15, 2024", readTime: "5 min read", category: "Estate Planning Basics" }, { title: "Will vs Trust: Which is Right for Your Family?", excerpt: "Understanding the key differences between wills and trusts can help you make the best decision for your estate planning needs.", date: "March 8, 2024", readTime: "7 min read", category: "Wills & Trusts" }, { title: "Estate Planning for Young Families", excerpt: "Why parents with young children shouldn't wait to create an estate plan, and what documents are most important.", date: "March 1, 2024", readTime: "6 min read", category: "Family Planning" }, { title: "Understanding Probate in Missouri and Illinois", excerpt: "A comprehensive guide to the probate process in both states and how proper planning can help your family avoid it.", date: "February 22, 2024", readTime: "8 min read", category: "Legal Process" }, { title: "How to Choose an Executor for Your Will", excerpt: "Important considerations when selecting the person who will be responsible for carrying out your final wishes.", date: "February 15, 2024", readTime: "5 min read", category: "Estate Planning Basics" }, { title: "Common Estate Planning Mistakes to Avoid", excerpt: "Learn from the most frequent errors people make in estate planning and how to prevent them in your own plan.", date: "February 8, 2024", readTime: "6 min read", category: "Tips & Advice" } ]; const categories = [ "Estate Planning Basics", "Wills & Trusts", "Family Planning", "Legal Process", "Tips & Advice" ]; return (

Estate Planning Blog

Expert insights and practical guidance for protecting your family's future

{categories.map((category) => ( {category} ))}
{blogPosts.map((post, index) => (
Article
{post.category} {post.date} {post.readTime}

{post.title}

{post.excerpt}

))}

Need Personalized Advice?

While our blog provides general information, every family's situation is unique. Get personalized guidance with a free consultation.

Schedule Free Consultation

Popular Topics

Will vs Trust 12 articles
Probate Process 8 articles
Family Protection 15 articles
Estate Taxes 6 articles
Powers of Attorney 9 articles

Free Resources

Estate Planning Checklist Will vs Trust Comparison Executor's Guide Missouri Estate Planning Laws Illinois Estate Planning Laws

Contact Information

Emily Kirk, Attorney

168 N Meramec Ave Suite 150

Clayton, MO 63105

(314) 266-2649

Hours: 9:00 AM – 6:00 PM
Flexible scheduling available

Ready to Start Your Estate Plan?

Don't let estate planning remain on your to-do list. Take the first step today with a free consultation.

Schedule Free Consultation Call (314) 266-2649
); }; export default Blog;
